title: Simple tabbouleh salad
ingredients: ['125g bulgur wheat', '600ml boiling water', '4 tablespoons olive oil', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1 green pepper, seeded and choppd', '2 spring onions, sliced', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh mint', '2 tomatoes, chopped', '2 teaspoons lemon juice']
